cmb:
MANA COST: 50
COOLDOWN: 15
desc: Fires a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area.
notes: Consumes a charge to a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 40 seconds. Maximum 3 charges.
lore: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.
name: sniper_shrapnel

desc: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving a chance to deal extra damage and slow unit. Headshot procs cannot be evaded.
notes:
Causes a 0.5 second 100% MS and AS slow.
Works on allied creeps.
Slow is blocked by magic immunity.
lore: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.
name: sniper_headshot

desc: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.
lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.
name: sniper_take_aim

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 175/275/375
COOLDOWN: 20/15/10
desc: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit, and after 1.7 seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.
notes:
Crosshair effect is only visible to allies.
Invisibility doesn't disjoint the projectile.
Interrupts channeling spell, including on magic immune units.
lore: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.
name: sniper_assassinate
